data.oai_dc:dc: (Appendix A) Major and trace element composition of basal sediments at DSDP Hole 85-573B

85-573B, Aluminium oxide, Barium, Boron, Calcium oxide, Cerium, Chromium, Cobalt, Comment, Copper, Deep Sea Drilling Project, DRILL, Drilling/drill rig, DSDP, Glomar Challenger, Iron oxide, Fe2O3, Lanthanum, Leg85, Lithium, Magnesium oxide, Manganese oxide, Nickel, North Pacific/TROUGH, ODP sample designation, Phillips PV8210/ICP Emission Spectrometer, Phosphorus oxide, Potassium oxide, Sample code/label, Scandium, Silicon dioxide, Sodium oxide, Strontium, Titanium, Vanadium, Yttrium, Zinc
